(OOC: What? Who would vote Solo for best female character? No offense to
anyone who likes her but she isn't one of my best bots but I'm not about to
kill her. I never thought someone actually liked Solo.)

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 15, 2000 1:06 AM
Subject: Awards


>
> Allright, I know I promised I'd post the polls today, but I gotta go
sleep,
> and don't have enough time. I will post the polls tomorrow, but I'll post
the

>
> DO NOT SEND ME YOUR VOTES!! I'll set up polls tomorrow for everyone to
